scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run terraform:validate
scripts.docs: echo 'Documentation available at: docs/README.md' && echo 'GitHub setup: docs/GITHUB_SETUP.md' && echo 'Deployment guide: DEPLOYMENT.md'
scripts.terraform:check-vars: cd terraform && terraform plan -refresh=false > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo '✅ All required variables are configured' || echo '❌ Missing required variables - check terraform.tfvars'
scripts.infra:setup: echo 'Run: npm run terraform:init && npm run terraform:plan && npm run terraform:apply'
scripts.setup:complete: echo 'Infrastructure setup complete! Configure GitHub secrets and variables using terraform output.'
scripts.docs:variables: echo 'See docs/GITHUB_VARIABLES_SETUP.md for GitHub Variables setup guide'
